__comment__: JSON file specifying the image to use for a given type/name and resolution. Read in by cartopy.mpl.geoaxes.read_user_background_images.

ne_shaded.__comment__: Natural Earth shaded relief. This is the image from cartopy

grey_ocean.__comment__: Greyscale land is #F0F0F0 and ocean is #E5E5E5
grey_ocean.__source__: Generated by Rob from the coastlines
